title: Logo using Avant Garde - feedback?
content:
hey Typophile folks-

I am at the end of a logo development process with a grassroots media justice organization. They wanted Avant Garde for the font, and I'm just trying to put the final fine tuning on the logo's type. any feedback greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023024101im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CMJ_logo6D_5143.jpg)
author: sparkler_girl

comments.content:
Dislike the varying weights. And don't quite get the mark. Seems too retro with the font choice and color scheme.

penn
Boy, that space after the A (which calls attention to itself) really screams to have the mark placed there.
If you have to use Avant Garde, don’t use the gimmicky letters and/or ligatures. And try using different weights to keep the letters feeling consistently thick across sizes.
